subtitle: A Chinese Dim Sum recipe, these peppers are stuffed with prawns and pork. They can be made in advance and steamed or simply fried when required.

method.text: Mix together all the stuffing ingredients until well combined.
Dust the pepper halves with cornflour. Fill with the stuffing.
Place two pepper halves at a time on a plate. Steam gently on a rack in a wok for 20 min. Repeat with the other pepper halves.
To serve: Heat the oil in a wok or frying pan over a moderate heat and fry the peppers, stuffing side down, until lightly brown and heated through.

title: Stuffed peppers
